metadata.name: Suspicious Greedy Compression Using Rar.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects RAR usage that creates an archive from a suspicious folder, either a system folder or one of the folders often used by attackers for staging purposes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rar.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('command line rar') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' a -m'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -hp')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -r ')) AND (lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\.*\..*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\\*\..*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\$recycle\.bin\\.*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\perflogs\\.*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\temp.*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\users\\public\\.*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.* .:\\windows\\.*' OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' %public%'))))

output.summary: Detects RAR usage that creates an archive from a suspicious folder, either a system folder or one of the folders often used by attackers for staging purposes
